thag4.5:5.4: I tore out my hair and beard.
thag4.5:6.4: I didn’t accept food set aside for me.
thag4.5:7.1: I did many deeds of this kind,
thag4.5:7.2: which lead to a bad destination.
thag4.5:7.3: Swept away by a great flood,
thag4.5:7.4: I went to the Buddha for refuge.
thag4.5:8.2: See the excellence of the teaching!
